text: Is there any api to export reports data directly.HubSpot only sends report through emails, is there any workaround for it?

Is there any way to get the email of the deleted contact when the user tries to manually delete it from HubSpot? Actually, I configured the webhook with the event "contact.deletion" but in the payload, I am not getting the contact email.

Hello,
How can I fetch trough api the last phone call associated with a contact?
Is the association api retrieves the data based on date created desc?

see this thread in the community pages and see if it applies to your situation:  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Unable-to-create-a-webhook-following-the-documentation/td-p/769011>
He was talking about building a custom interfaced based on the data sync interface
Look at the call engagement API <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/calls|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/calls>
You'll need to do a second API call to the specific contact and include property history

Have you checked out the exports API?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/exports|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/exports>

Yeah I've already looked at the api docs. My problem is that I want to get the latest call to the contact.
Through Associations api I can get the call Ids. But I don't have a way to fetch or know which of them is the latest call or do I?
I can fetch all of the calls through batch fetch calls and then finds the latest call through code.
The problem is what happens if the Contact had 10 thousand calls?
I can still fetch them all but it a lot of API calls it takes time to receive all of the calls
ahh, then you need to use GraphQL
I didn't know I could fetch with GraphQL do you have an example how?
yes i do. Let me find that code.
Thank you!!
Thanks!
yup

ah you're too kind man
Thanks Justin I will try this

Hi Everyone,
I am planning to use the HubSpot api to pull the contacts from HubSpot. For which i can only see an api to get all the contacts which exists in the account.
Is there a way i can get the contact of a particular list using its listid?
But these are crm exports, I have to export dashboard reports data. <@U03REFNRMB3>

Yes this is possible with the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/exports#post-%2Fcrm%2Fv3%2Fexports%2Fexport%2Fasync|Exports API>.
Use the `SchemaType: PublicExportListRequest`
on the linked page.

One thing to note though - this API does not return the results synchronously, which just means you use this API to initiate an export request and then you would collect the exported contacts by querying a separate API endpoint (as exports can take a while to process).

If it is not required to be fully automated, I would just start an Export and pick up the exported file from the HubSpot UI [Settings > Data Management > Import & Export]
Does anyone know how we could tag a user in a note generated through the API? Is there markdown for that or something?

Sorry, you are correct, there isnâ€™t a way to get a specific report.

You might try and build your export with the old analytics endpoint: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/analytics-and-events/reporting>
